encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌手：Jewel 专辑：Sweet And Wild 语种：英语 完整歌词 if you love somebody 如果你爱上某人 you'd better let it out 最好亲口说出 don't hold it back 不要犹豫不决 while you're trying to figure it out 当你试图找到答案 don't be timid 不要胆怯害羞 don't be afraid to hurt 不要惧怕受伤 run toward the flame 赴汤蹈火 run toward the fire在所不惜 hold on for all your worth 为值得你做的一切坚持不懈 cau

entry.def: If you are satisfied with something, you are happy because you have got what you wanted or needed.

example.ex: We are not satisfied with these results.
example.tran: 我们对这些结果并不满意。

entry.def: If you are satisfied that something is true or has been done properly, you are convinced about this after checking it.

example.ex: People must be satisfied that the treatment is safe.
example.tran: 人们必须确信这种治疗方法是安全的。

sentences.sentence: "his thirst quenched he was able to continue"

auth_sentence.content: The former may not be satisfied by the latter.

auth_sentence.content: No, I was satisfied with the standard resolution.

Sentence.sentence: Barbara, on the other hand, has missed the excitement of her profession and does not feel she would be satisfied doing volunteer work.
You might expect that the student who had undertaken the most exhausted search would be the most satisfied with their final decision, but it turns out that's not true.
The reason why these people feel less satisfied is that a world of possibilities may also be a world of missed opportunities

sentences.en: When she had finished her meal, she gave a satisfied smile.
sentences.cn: 当她吃完饭后, 她露出了满意的笑容。
